author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/ready-or-not/

Become an elite SWAT commander and bring order to a city overwhelmed by chaos and corruption.

Lead a team of highly-trained SWAT officers through unpredictable high-risk missions against ruthless criminals to prevent the city from spiralling into disorder. Equip real-world weapons and gear to tackle missions inspired by current events against Los Sueňos’ ruthless criminal element. 

Every decision, from squad selection to tactical breach and engagement is the difference between life and death.

Are you ready?

FEATURES

Take Command
Ready or Not delivers an immersive SWAT experience. Equip your team with authentic weapons and gear, deploy into high-stakes, real-world inspired missions to secure locations concealing unknown criminal threats and potential civilians. Every mission demands tactical precision and situational awareness. Bullets from known and concealed threats react realistically with the environment, passing through walls,
title: Ready or Not - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013491

Painkiller is a modern reimagining of the classic franchise, featuring online co-op for up to three players and offline play. Battle hordes of demons and titanic terrors across richly detailed gothic environments.

Trapped in Purgatory, you are sentenced for your transgressions against Heaven. But the Voice of the Creator gives you a chance to redeem yourself.  

Coming to PlayStation this Fall, Wishlist Now!

#ps5 #ps5games #painkiller 

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit www.esrb.org for rating information.
title: Painkiller - Weapons Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Each year, the Paintress inscribes the cursed number on her monolith — and each year, an expedition sets out to end her reign. None have ever returned, but they have laid the trail for those who come after. Sixty-seven years after their world shattered in the Fracture, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 follows the idealists still daring to dream of a future for Lumière. 

In this trailer — narrated by Jennifer English (voice of Maelle in the English version) — step into Maelle’s world on the eve of her departure with Expedition 33. One last chance to destroy the Paintress, so that she may never paint death again.

Expedition 33 will release on April 24 2025 on Playstation 5. Pre-order now!

#ps5 #ps5games #clairobscur 

Rated Mature
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Lore Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012303/

The Oldest House is teeming with dangerous paranatural hazards, like a Furnace spewing fire across the Maintenance Sector or pink Exogenic Mass that explodes if you touch it. It’s up to you, as a Firebreaker, to face these hazards with your friends, contain them, and get out in one piece. 

FBC: Firebreak is a 3-player cooperative first-person shooter set within the enigmatic Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). As the Bureau’s headquarters faces a deadly and prolonged siege by otherworldly forces, only Firebreak—its most adaptable response unit—has the skills and courage to restore order.  

FBC: Firebreak is scheduled to release in Summer 2025 for PlayStation 5. Wishlist now! 

Developed and published by Remedy Entertainment. 

#ps5 #ps5games #FBCFirebreak #firebreak
title: FBC: Firebreak - Hazards of the Job Trailer I PS5 Games

This new trailer showcases the game's unique approach to physics-based destruction. Whether it's crashing through fences, skidding across rooftops, or toppling the town’s prized landmarks, Winston will do whatever it takes to get the job done!

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011377

Research Participants the world over, your invitation to our new testing program is available now as Bionic Bay releases for PlayStation 5.

Master the art of teleportation. Control the very fabric of time itself. Manipulate gravity and uncover the mystery of Bionic Bay. We’ll provide you with the tools needed to traverse the intricately crafted, pixel-art world of Bionic Bay. Research Participants will, however, be required to supply your own close control, exceptional timing, puzzle solving intuition and maybe a little bit of luck. In addition, you’ll find our thrilling ghost data racing within Bionic Bay Online, perfect for speedrunners and those hungry for a challenge.

Bionic Bay is available NOW for PlayStation 5 - https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011377/

It’s time to take science into your own hands. Good luck, Research Participants!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Bionic Bay - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition is coming to PlayStation 5 on May 6th, 2025! Pre-Order the Premium Edition today and get up-to 5 days of early access. Premium Edition includes the all-new Three Kingdoms expansion*, all previously released expansions, and animated profile icons.

Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition celebrates the 25th anniversary of one of the most popular strategy games ever, now with stunning 4K Ultra HD graphics, a fully remastered soundtrack, and includes three expansions with the base game: “Lords of the West,” “Dynasties of India,” and “Dawn of the Dukes".

Explore all the original Campaigns and the best-selling expansions like never before. With over 200 hours of gameplay and 1,000 years of human history, improved experiences await. Head online to challenge other players** in your quest for world domination with more than 45 different Civilizations.  

*The Three Kingdoms expansion included with purchase of Premium Edition game. Separate purchase require
title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Pre-Order Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011603

Welcome to Abathor - Ultimate Edition!
The definitive way to experience this brutal 2D action-platformer — solo or with up to 4 players.
Embark on an epic 16-bit quest inspired by Golden Axe, Rastan, and Super Castlevania IV, and fight to reclaim Atlantis from the forces of darkness.

Enjoy authentic pixel art crafted by veteran artists from the era, and a killer chiptune soundtrack
featuring legends like Soyo Oka (Super Mario Kart), Gryzor87 (Cursed Castilla), and many more.

This Ultimate Edition features major upgrades:
- Speed meets brutality: Characters now run! All hitboxes redesigned for a faster, fresher, and more dynamic experience.
- A handcrafted world map like no other: Fully redrawn in pixel art — massive, detailed, and unprecedented in retro-style worldbuilding.
- Balanced difficulty modes: From Adventure Mode for newcomers to Heroic Mode with more accessible saves for seasoned players.
- SpeedRun Mode: All characters
title: Abathor - Ultimate Edition Out Now | PS5 & PS4 Games

description:
World of Goo 2 is coming to PlayStation 5 on April 25, with THREE new finger-destroying Challenge Levels crafted especially for the most clever, the most hardcore, the most goo-imbued players. Even some of the development team are unable to complete them.

The PS5 release will include:
* Three new extremely difficult challenge levels!
* Over 30 Extra Fabulous Achievements!
* Featuring an acclaimed soundtrack - with over 47 tracks and nearly 2 hours of music performed by over 50 musicians from the World of Goo community!
* And more!

#ps5 #ps5games #worldofgoo2
title: World of Goo 2 - Official Trailer 3 | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Empire of the Ants is now available on the PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10007652

Discover how Tower Five brought Empire of the Ants to life on PlayStation 5 in this exclusive behind-the-scenes short-documentary.

Over the past three years, the team has worked relentlessly to create a hyper-realistic microcosm. They ventured into the French forests over the seasons to scan rocks, trees, and moss using photogrammetry, captured authentic wildlife sounds, and transformed nature into an immersive RTS experience with Unreal Engine 5.

With insights from the renowned Author Bernard Werber himself, this making-of explores the passion and technology behind this next-gen adaptation of the iconic 1991 sci-fi novel.
PlayStation 5 retail edition is also available.

#ps5 #ps5games #empireoftheants
title: Empire of the Ants - The Making-of a Next-Gen RTS | PS5 Games

Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree is a dark fantasy action RPG, out now on PlayStation®5. Battle monsters across an expansive story, craft powerful upgrades, and explore this vast, ruined world before Entropy consumes it.

SUCCUMB TO A DARK FANTASY WORLD

#ps5 #ps5games #mandragora

author: PlayStation
description:
Get ready for the ultimate truck driving experience with the enhanced version of Truck Driver on PlayStation 5! This upgraded edition delivers stunning graphical improvements and smoother gameplay, making every journey feel more immersive than ever.

🌟 New & Improved Features:
✅ 4K Resolution and 60 fluid fps
✅ Ambient Occlusion for more realistic lighting and depth
✅ Smoother Day-Night Cycle for natural transitions
✅ Upgraded Mirrors with fluid reflections
✅ Enhanced Shadows & Reflections for a more realistic world
✅ Increased Draw Distance to see more of the open road

00:00 - Intro
00:19 - Take the Road
00:29 - Graphical improvements 
00:39 - Complete all orders
00:47 - Customize your truck
00:59 - Enjoy all DLCs
01:09 - Improve your driving skills

Hit the road like never before! 🚚 Experience Truck Driver with improved visuals, better performance, and next-gen immersion. Watch now and get ready to drive!

#ps5 #ps5games #TruckDriver #TruckDriverGame #TruckDriverPS5
title: Truck Driver Gold Edition - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10007347

Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate is out now on PlayStation 5.

Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate is a side-scrolling 2D anime-style beat'em up! It is a fully reworked version of the original title launched a decade ago. The new version includes revamped and smoother gameplay thanks to a full rebuild of the game in Unreal Engine 5, local and online co-op, and Versus Modes for up to 8 players worldwide, including cross-platform support.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #phantombreaker
